name: Card Games on Hoverbikes
description:
Live your wildest dreams of playing card games on Hoverbikes !

Duel against your opponent who is running in another circuit and win by reducing his Life Points to 0 !

Controls :

- WASD or ZQSD to control the hoverbike
- Use the mouse to use the cards

How to play the game :

-The goal is to reduce your opponent life points to 0 (Red bar on the right) while keeping yours above 0 (Blue bar on the left)
- To do this you will need to play cards. You can draw cards by driving over them on the circuit. To play them you need to spend Speed Counters (showed on the bottom left). You gain Speed Counters gradually while you are moving. The faster you go,  the faster you gain Speed Counters !
- When you use a card, it goes into the Discard Pile. Go through the starting line to shuffle back your discard pile into the Deck !

Game made for Mix & Game Jam 2020
